questions.text: You've arrived at the client's residence, 5901 Laureate St.
You're here to inform the client that he is losing his transportation benefits.
First thing's first: can you be sure this is the right house?

options.explanation: Incorrect. You can't see the house number from here.
Correct! You can't see the house number from here.

questions.text: Now look and listen. Do you feel safe going to the door?

options.explanation: There aren't any serious red flags; let's continue for now.

questions.text: Feel free to look around some more, then click below when you're ready to continue to the door.
